segments.advisor_message: So, regarding your life assurance policy, could you confirm who the owner is? Is it you, or perhaps someone else?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it's me, I think. Or, actually, wait—let me check. I might've put it under my spouse's name instead.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! Please double-check that. And while you're at it, do you remember which insurance company provides the policy?
segments.client_message: I thought it was ABC Insurance... but now I'm second-guessing. It might be XYZ Insurance actually. I need to look at the paperwork again.
